ï»¿U4~MENT RECOMMINDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, Internatioaal Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Flood Risk Management Project) to the Co-operative Republic of Guyana. The undersigned Conn nittee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to Co-operative Republic of Guyana (the Recipient), a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR $7,700,000. The purpose of said credit is to reduce the risk of flooding in the low-lying areas of the East Demerara. 1. The Committee has care fully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit, and of the purpose to which the prcceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Project is designed to promote the economic development of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana and is of high developmental priority in the light of the need; of the Co-operative Republic of Guyana.
ï»¿-2- Co-operative Republic of Guyana (Flood Risk Management Project) 3. Accordingly, the Comn ittee finds that said Project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said Project for such assistance. __JwyMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel /N inee SÂ§elected by Governor for the -operative ep blic of Guyana 0 ional Vice President Latin A na and the Caribbean Dated at Washington, D.
